Package grafioschtrader.reports.udfalluserfields

Class YahooEarningNextDate

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reports.udfalluserfields.AllUserFieldsSecurity
grafioschtrader.reports.udfalluserfields.YahooUDFFields
grafioschtrader.reports.udfalluserfields.YahooEarningNextDate
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUDFForEveryUser
@Service public class YahooEarningNextDate extends YahooUDFFields implements IUDFForEveryUser
Service class for extracting and providing the next earnings announcement dates from Yahoo Finance as user-defined fields for securities across all users in the system. This class extends YahooUDFFields to provide automatic extraction of upcoming earnings dates from Yahoo Finance's earnings calendar pages. The service performs web scraping of Yahoo Finance earnings calendar data to extract the specific date and time of the next scheduled earnings announcement for each security. This information is crucial for investment timing, portfolio management, and risk assessment around earnings events. Key features include:
- Automatic Yahoo symbol resolution for accurate data retrieval
- Web scraping of Yahoo Finance earnings calendar pages with HTML parsing
- Extraction of precise date and time information for next earnings announcements
- Intelligent date validation to ensure only future earnings dates are captured
- Background processing capability for improved user experience
- Asset class filtering to ensure dates are only extracted for equity securities
- Automatic expiration and refresh of past earnings dates
- Rate-limited access to Yahoo Finance services for reliable operation
- Persistent storage of extracted dates in the UDF system
Unlike static link generation, this service performs active data extraction and provides actionable date/time information that can be used for automated decision-making and alerts.
